other_tests.findings: Multicystic intradural extramedullary mass extending from L3 to the sacrococcyx and a paravertebral multivesicular cystic mass suggestive of a multivesicular hydatid cyst.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Control MRI 1 month later showed significant improvement of the intra-dural component. MRI after 10 months of treatment showed further reduction of lesion size and disappearance of the daughter cysts but no cyst calcification.

other_tests.findings: Cyst sheathed with a fibrous capsule, outer layer with multi-nucleated giant cells and chronic inflammatory cells. Laminated hyaline and acellular membrane with a germinal layer where brood capsules were identified.
